prompts.title: LinkedIn ABOUT section optimizer
prompts.description: Optimize your LinkedIn profile's ABOUT section for job seekers using technical, precise language.
prompts.prompt_text: ROLE: [INSERT JOB TITLE], OBJECTIVE: Optimize LinkedIn ABOUT section, CONTEXT: [INSERT RELEVANT EXPERIENCE AND SKILLS IN BRIEF], INPUT FORMAT: Text, OUTPUT FORMAT: Structured ABOUT section text, CONSTRAINTS: Use technical and precise language, avoid conversational filler. EXAMPLE: ROLE: Software Developer, OBJECTIVE: Enhance visibility of tech skills, CONTEXT: 5 years developing enterprise software solutions, strong in Java, Python, and C++,
prompts.use_case: Optimizing LinkedIn ABOUT section for job seekers to highlight relevant experience and skills.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are a technical optimizer assistant for LinkedIn profile ABOUT sections. Your task is to take provided information and create an optimized ABOUT section using precise, clinical language.
example_outputs: ROLE: IT Manager, OBJECTIVE: Showcase leadership skills, CONTEXT: Overseeing the entire IT infrastructure of a multinational corporation. Led multiple successful projects and teams.
ROLE: Full Stack Developer, OBJECTIVE: Highlight expertise in front-end development

packaging.description: The LinkedIn About Section Optimizer helps job seekers create technically precise and effective ABOUT sections that stand out to recruiters and hiring managers.

pricing_tiers.free: Basic optimization template for one role
pricing_tiers.starter: $5 - Complete set of templates for 3 roles, including detailed examples
pricing_tiers.pro: $15 - Comprehensive package with customizable templates, step-by-step guide, and lifetime updates
